snippet: In less than two seasons as a full-time reliever, Davis is putting up numbers that leave his opponents shaking their heads in disbelief, and admiration.
abstract: Tyler Kepner Extra Bases column holds Baltimore Orioles pitcher Wade Davis has played remarkably well since becoming full-time reliever in Sept 2013; notes Davis has thrown 117 games with an earned run average of .80, with 180 strikeouts and no home runs allowed; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: In less than two seasons as a full-time reliever, Davis is putting up numbers that leave his opponents shaking their heads in disbelief, and admiration.

headline.print_headline: From Rotation to Bullpen to Stratosphere
headline.main: Wade Davis, From Rotation to Bullpen to Stratosphere
